attributes.action: withdraw our troops from Iraq as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not our war!
We don't want any more of our soldiers killed and can only imagine the grief and devastation that these deaths must cause to the families and friends of the victims and for what?
We feel that the cost of this operation could be put to far better use on causes at home, eg NHS hospitals, The Police Force, Anti-terrorism measures ...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
